readable.title: 349889354_4b2889a9bd
readable.content: A person on what appears to be a surfboard , rides the waves onto shore . A surfer in the distance is at the base of the wave close to the shore . A surfer is caught in an incoming wave along a dirty beach nearby mountains . A surfer rides a wave as it crashes on the beach . A surfer takes on a high wave beyond a rocky beach .
